basics.name: Luis Fernando Martinez
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with 4 years of experience
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer experienced in Front-end and Back-end technologies including ReactJS, VueJS, Node.js, and NestJS. Skilled in REST API integration, UI/UX design, and performance optimization. Experience in mobile app development with React Native.
